attributes.action: bring environmentalism, conservationalism and sustainable life management into national education as a regular and compulsory subject until year 9
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Climate change is now an inevitable truth. We need to act now to protect our future generations from a world laid to waste by the twentieth and twenty-first centuries. The best way to actively change our attitudes and practices is to educate ourselves. If Labour truly believes in the motto "education, education, education", then we should use this simple and effective tool in order to do just that. We must learn how to manage our lives sustainably and without damaging the lives of others and to combat a situation that could be near devastation this must be implemented on a national scale.
